metadata.description: Single gate pass-through and landing using hybrid time-based navigation

waypoints.description: First gate at 100cm height, 200cm forward from start
Landing target 150cm after gate, descend to 30cm before landing

notes.cm_per_second: Speed calibration - run calibrate_time_based_navigation() to determine for your drone
notes.forward_power: Power level for forward movement (20-40 recommended)
notes.throttle_power: Power level for up/down movement (20-30 recommended)
notes.height_timeout_sec: Maximum time to reach target height
notes.flow_scale: Optical flow calibration (backup only in hybrid mode)
